message.en: This is it!{p=0.2} It's now or never!
message.es: This is it!{p=0.2} It's now or never!

message.en: You assume the perspective of the [color=#ee8695]host[/color],{p=0.2} who is staring down a job offer.
message.es: You assume the perspective of the [color=#ee8695]host[/color],{p=0.2} who is staring down a job offer.

message.en: The [color=#bf6dbf]pandemic[/color] has rippled throughout society,{p=0.2} stripping the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] of their previous job and social opportunities.
message.es: The [color=#bf6dbf]pandemic[/color] has rippled throughout society,{p=0.2} stripping the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] of their previous job and social opportunities.

condition.en: The [color=#ee8695]host[/color] believes it to be [color=#ee8695]their[/color] first step to normal life...{p=0.2} if only [color=#ee8695]they'd[/color] take it.
condition.es: The [color=#ee8695]host[/color] believes it to be [color=#ee8695]their[/color] first step to normal life...{p=0.2} if only [color=#ee8695]they'd[/color] take it.

message.en: What [color=#fbbbad]memory[/color] would you like to [color=#ee8695]finally[/color] instill?
message.es: What [color=#fbbbad]memory[/color] would you like to [color=#ee8695]finally[/color] instill?

message.en: Looking at the offer, the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is reminded of the people [color=#ee8695]they[/color] could meet,{p=0.2} career opportunities,{p=0.2} and structure it could provide.
message.es: Looking at the offer, the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is reminded of the people [color=#ee8695]they[/color] could meet,{p=0.2} career opportunities,{p=0.2} and structure it could provide.

message.en: ...{p=0.5} But doing that every day?
message.es: ...{p=0.5} But doing that every day?

message.en: Select a [color=#fbbbad]memory[/color].
message.es: Select a [color=#fbbbad]memory[/color].

message.en: Looking at the offer,{p=0.2} [color=#ee8695]they[/color] feel like [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] not meant for it.{p=0.5} Like an imposter.
message.es: Looking at the offer,{p=0.2} [color=#ee8695]they[/color] feel like [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] not meant for it.{p=0.5} Like an imposter.

message.en: The [color=#ee8695]host[/color] attempts to be compassionate to [color=#ee8695]themselves[/color],{p=0.2} but questions if that in of itself is real.
message.es: The [color=#ee8695]host[/color] attempts to be compassionate to [color=#ee8695]themselves[/color],{p=0.2} but questions if that in of itself is real.

message.en: Select a [color=#fbbbad]memory[/color].
message.es: Select a [color=#fbbbad]memory[/color].

message.en: Looking at the offer,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is reminded of the what [color=#ee8695]they've[/color] done in the past.
message.es: Looking at the offer,{p=0.2} the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] is reminded of the what [color=#ee8695]they've[/color] done in the past.

message.en: [color=#ee8695]They've[/color] been through worse--this shouldn't be that bad.
message.es: [color=#ee8695]They've[/color] been through worse--this shouldn't be that bad.

message.en: ...{p=0.2} But was that really [color=#ee8695]them[/color],{p=0.5} back then?
message.es: ...{p=0.2} But was that really [color=#ee8695]them[/color],{p=0.5} back then?

message.en: The [color=#ee8695]host[/color] turns the paper over,{p=0.2} under,{p=0.2} left,{p=0.2} and right.
message.es: The [color=#ee8695]host[/color] turns the paper over,{p=0.2} under,{p=0.2} left,{p=0.2} and right.

message.en: [color=#ee8695]They[/color] feel...{p=0.5} anything but [color=#fbbbad]hopeful[/color] or [color=#fbbbad]determined[/color].
message.es: [color=#ee8695]They[/color] feel...{p=0.5} anything but [color=#fbbbad]hopeful[/color] or [color=#fbbbad]determined[/color].

message.en: What do [color=#ee8695]you[/color] want to do?
message.es: What do [color=#ee8695]you[/color] want to do?

message.en: [color=#ee8695]You[/color] remind the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] that [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] not an island.
message.es: [color=#ee8695]You[/color] remind the [color=#ee8695]host[/color] that [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] not an island.

message.en: [color=#ee8695]You[/color] remind [color=#ee8695]them[/color] that [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] capable by virtue of being born.
message.es: [color=#ee8695]You[/color] remind [color=#ee8695]them[/color] that [color=#ee8695]they're[/color] capable by virtue of being born.

message.en: [color=#ee8695]You[/color] remind [color=#ee8695]them[/color] that [color=#ee8695]you[/color] are,{p=0.2} in fact,{p=0.2} worth time and energy.{p=0.5} By being born into this world,{p=0.2} [color=#ee8695]you[/color] are free to live happily.
message.es: [color=#ee8695]You[/color] remind [color=#ee8695]them[/color] that [color=#ee8695]you[/color] are,{p=0.2} in fact,{p=0.2} worth time and energy.{p=0.5} By being born into this world,{p=0.2} [color=#ee8695]you[/color] are free to live happily.

message.en: The [color=#ee8695]host[/color] eyes the paper one last time.
message.es: The [color=#ee8695]host[/color] eyes the paper one last time.

message.en: Through the orb,{p=0.2} [color=#ee8695]your[/color] field of view pans to a pen,{p=0.2} seemingly ready to sign on that dotted line.
message.es: Through the orb,{p=0.2} [color=#ee8695]your[/color] field of view pans to a pen,{p=0.2} seemingly ready to sign on that dotted line.

message.en: For a moment,{p=0.2} you feel {p=0.2}[color=#fbbbad]determined.[/color]
message.es: For a moment,{p=0.2} you feel {p=0.2}[color=#fbbbad]determined.[/color]
